Notes.Text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

- security update:
  * CVE-2016-6520: buffer overflow [bsc#991872]
  * CVE-2016-5010: Out-of-bounds read in CopyMagickMemory [bsc#991444]
  * CVE-2016-6491: Out-of-bounds read when processing crafted tiff files [bsc#991445]
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick before 6.9.5-3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted TIFF file.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer overflow in the Get8BIMProperty function in MagickCore/property.c in ImageMagick before 6.9.5-4 and 7.x before 7.0.2-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read, memory leak, and crash) via a crafted image.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer overflow in MagickCore/enhance.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.2-7 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to pixel cache morphology.
